game

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • game.Ship
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Ship
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class defines ship object and contains information on its location and firing status.
    Author:
    JustinDowty, Ted Lang, Alec Allain
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
